mapper.insert: INSERT INTO followmanage ( uid, followuid, date, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3, attribute4, attribute5) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{followuid}, now(), #{attribute1}, #{attribute2}, #{attribute3}, #{attribute4}, #{attribute5})
mapper.select:
select f.followid, u.username, u.profileimgurl, u.uid, ( select t.name from team t, teammember tm where t.teamid = tm.teamid and tm.uid = u.uid ) as teamname, ( select count(*) from usermission um where um.uid= u.uid ) as usermissioncount, ( select sum(grade + passgrade) from usermission um where um.uid= u.uid ) as score, ( select count(*) from followmanage fw where fw.followuid = u.uid ) as followercount, ( select count(*) from followmanage fw where fw.uid = u.uid ) as followingcount, ( select count(*) from board bd where bd.writeuid = u.uid ) as mecommentcount, ( select count(*) from board bd where bd.uid = u.uid ) as commentcount,
1 as followtype,
2 as followtype,
20 as level from followmanage f, user u where 1=1
and f.followuid = u.uid and f.uid = #{uid}
and f.uid = u.uid and f.followuid = #{uid}
order by f.date
select count(*) as count, 'M' as type from followmanage where followuid = #{param1} union all select count(*) as count, 'Y' as type from followmanage where uid= #{param1}
